title: Linodes Ultra Soft Convertible Dance Tights/Ballet Transition Tight (Toddler/Little Kid/Big Kid/Women)
features: MATERIAL: Linodes Ultra Soft Dance/Ballet Transition Tights are made of high quality nylon and spandex with exceptional stretch and recovery.

FEATURES: 1. Seamless and moisture wicking material keeps you clean and comfortable when dancing; 2. With the transition design (round opening at the bottom of sole), it can be a footed or footless tight; 3. High elastic material makes Linodes tights easier to fit.
OCCASIONS: Especially suitable for ballet dance, gymnastics, performance, class practice, cheer leading and daily wear. RECOMMENDED CARE: hand wash cold and hang dry
SIZE: Please choose your size according to the size information in product picture or description. We suggest you measure your leg length first for a better fit.

SERVICE & GUARANTEE: The quality of Linodes dance/ballet tights is guaranted. We offer you free return policy and please contact us freely if you have any question or problem about our product or service.
